mapper.insert: insert into C_CONSUMER(C_ID, C_PASSWORD, C_NICKNAME, C_NAME, C_BIRTH, C_PHONE, C_EMAIL, C_PROFILEIMG, C_LEVEL) values (#{cId}, #{cPassword}, #{cNickname}, #{cName}, #{cBirth}, #{cPhone}, #{cEmail}, #{cProfileImg}, #{cLevel})
mapper.select: select count (*) from A_ORDER where C_ID = #{cId} and A_ORDER_STATUS = #{aOrderStatus}
select C_ID, C_NICKNAME, C_NAME, C_BIRTH, C_JOINDAY, C_PHONE, C_EMAIL, C_PROFILEIMG, C_LEVEL from C_CONSUMER where C_ID = #{cId} and rownum <= 1
select count(*) from C_CONSUMER where C_ID = #{cId} and rownum <= 1
select count(*) from C_CONSUMER where C_NICKNAME = #{cNickname} and rownum <= 1
select count(*) from C_CONSUMER where C_EMAIL = #{cEmail} and rownum <= 1
select C_ID from C_CONSUMER where C_EMAIL = #{cEmail} and rownum <= 1
select * from C_CONSUMER where C_ID = #{cId} and rownum <= 1
SELECT ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -1) AS startdate, LAST_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM')-1) AS enddate FROM dual
select count(*) from A_ORDER where C_ID=#{cId} and a_order_status='배달완료' and a_order_date BETWEEN #{startdate} and #{enddate}
mapper.update: update C_CONSUMER set C_LEVEL = #{cLevel} where C_ID = #{cId}
update C_ORDER set C_ID = #{newCid} where C_ID = #{cId}
